dmca.title: UK individual complains of defamation
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

We are solicitors instructed by [private].

More particularly we are instructed and are advising our client with regard to certain claims published and presently available through a search of our client's name using the Google search engine.  For your further information we include a printed copy of relevant search results.

In particular our client is most concerned that a search of her name reveals claims made by third parties and published by Google which are extremely damaging to our client's reputation and professional standing.  

These claims may be viewed by following a link provided by Google including without limitation on the following web site: 

[redacted]
